text: AWS Health is the authoritative source
of information about the performance
and availability of the AWS cloud resources
that can impact your applications,
including service events, account notifications,
and plan changes to AWS resources and services.
Discover out of the box solutions
that offer timely information and actionable guidance.
You can leverage AWS Health by receiving alerts via emails
and through AWS user notifications,
gaining visibility into the overall status
of your account and resources.
This allows you to make informed decisions
and take optimal actions
with tailored insights, while minimizing disruptions
to your applications.
It provides a centralized view of your account health,
highlighting service impacts and their root causes.
You can also enable efficient prioritization
and remediation of issues you find.
AWS Health meets you where you are
with flexible channels like programmatic access
via the AWS Health API,
push events using Amazon EventBridge,
and easy to understand alerts via AWS user notifications.
There are also prebuilt integrations
with popular tools and reference architecture
to supercharge your workflows even more.
Stay on top of your reliability
and operational excellence needs with AWS Health.
(soft music)
